Internal procedures based on this legislative basic act
Draft implementing regulation  Practical arrangements for the rail vehicle authorisation process;
Draft implementing decision  Specifications for the rail European vehicle register and the national vehicle registers;
Draft implementing regulation  Amendments as regards provisions on energy measuring system and data collecting system in rail;
Draft implementing regulation  Revision of technical specification for rail interoperability relating to the ‘telematics applications for freight’;
Draft implementing regulation  Amendment of the specifications for the register of infrastructure for railways;
Draft delegated decision  Specific objectives for the drafting, adoption and review of rail technical specifications for interoperability (TSIs);
Draft implementing regulation  Templates for the ‘EC’ declaration of conformity or suitability for use for rail;
Draft implementing regulation  Amendment of Operation TSI to align with the 4th Railway Package, close open points and reduce national rules;
Draft implementing regulation  Alignment of railway technical specifications for interoperability and EU register of vehicle types with the 4th package;
Draft implementing regulation  Rules for rail vehicle extension of area of use and specifications on standards and transition under Union requirements;
Draft implementing regulation  Information to be submitted in requests from Member States for non-application of Union rail requirements;
